title: Tada no Murabito no Boku ga, Sanbyakunen Mae no Boukun Ouji ni Tensei shite shimaimashita ~Zense no Chishiki de Ansatsu Flag wo Kaihi shite, Odayaka ni Ikinokorimasu!~
description: Prince Rudolf gained knowledge of the future 300 years from now during a near-death experience. He uses his wits to change the future in which he will be assassinated as a tyrant prince Meanwhile, discrepancies between the story passed down to posterity and reality gradually emerge...

altTitles.ja: ただの村人の僕が、三百年前の暴君皇子に転生してしまいました～前世の知識で暗殺フラグを回避して、穏やかに生き残ります！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tada no Murabito no Boku ga, Sanbyakunen Mae no Boukun Ouji ni Tensei shite shimaimashita ~Zense no Chishiki de Ansatsu Flag o Kaihi shite, Odayaka ni Ikinokorimasu!~

altTitles.en: I, a Mere Villager, Have Been Reincarnated as a Tyrant Prince From 300 Years Ago!: With the Knowledge of My Previous Life, I'll Avoid the Assassination Flags and Survive Peacefully!
